#include<iostream>

#define MOD 1000000007

using namespace std;

long long fib[1000000];

int main()
{


   long long i,t,a,b,r;

   fib[0]=1;

   fib[1]=1;

   for(i=2;i<1000000;i++)
   {

     fib[i]=(fib[i-1]%MOD+fib[i-2]%MOD)%MOD;

   }

   cin>>t;

   while(t--)
   {

      cin>>a>>b>>r;

      r--;

      a=a%MOD;

      b=b%MOD;

      if( r == 0 )

      cout<<a<<endl;

      else if( r == 1 )

           cout<<b<<endl;

           else cout<<(( fib[r-1]*b )%MOD+( fib[r-2]*a )%MOD)%MOD<<endl;;

   }

   return  0;

}
